participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Emily is outgoing, social, and loves to connect with others. She enjoys exploring new places and is always up for a fun adventure.
participant_1.background: I am a woman who wears a size 12. I am planning a trip to europe. I go to dance lessons with my boyfriend. I love to shop on weekends. I have never been on a cruise ship.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Jordan is energetic and passionate about fitness and writing. He has a creative spirit and enjoys discussing various topics.
participant_2.background: I love to workout. I work for a magazine. I love the game halo. Yellow is my favorite color.

content.text: I love to workout and I work for a magazine.
What do you like to write about?
I like to write about current events and popular culture.
Interesting! I like to read about those things too.
I love to shop, go to dance lessons with my boyfriend, and I'm planning a trip to Europe.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been to Europe, but I've always wanted to go.
You should! It's amazing! What's your favorite color?
Mine too! I love how it's bright and cheerful.
Me too! I think it's the perfect color for spring and summer.
I agree! I love wearing yellow dresses in the summer.
Me too! They're so fun and stylish.
I'm glad we have so much in common!
Me too! I think we'll be great friends.
